script.title: Create Your GOAT Account
script.content: Welcome! Let's get you started with GOAT. First, you'll need to create an account to access all our features.

script.title: What Do You Want to Create?
script.content: Great! Now that you're signed up, let's decide what you want to create with GOAT. We specialize in transforming knowledge into premium content.

script.title: Welcome to GOAT
script.content: Welcome! GOAT helps you transform your knowledge into premium audiobooks, podcasts, and training materials. Let's get you set up.
expected_questions: What can I create with GOAT?
Is this for fiction or non-fiction?

script.title: Upload Your Content
script.content: Upload your source material (manuscript, training docs, lessons). GOAT accepts PDF, DOCX, TXT, and markdown files.
expected_questions: Is there a file size limit?

script.title: Choose Your Voice Profile
script.content: Select from our library of voices or upload a voice sample to create a custom profile for your narrator.
expected_questions: Can I clone my own voice?

script.title: Understanding Pricing
script.content: GOAT uses pay-per-GB processing: $19.99 for first GB, then $5/GB. Packages: 5GB ($49), 10GB ($99), 20GB ($175).
expected_questions: How much will my project cost?
What if I need more than 20GB?

script.title: Optional Blockchain Features
script.content: Optional: Mint your content as NFTs for provenance. We prepare the data; you mint at TrueMark/CertSig on Polygon or Ethereum.
expected_questions: Do I have to use blockchain?
What's the difference between Polygon and Ethereum?

script.title: Ready to Create
script.content: You're all set! Start your first project and GOAT will guide you through each step of creating your audiobook or podcast.
